name: Colony integrator
category: 進階電腦週邊設備：週邊設備

pages.text: The colony integrator can interact with a colony from MineColonies..$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/peripherals/colony_integrator/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!

mapping.0: 計算機工藝：進階計算機

pages.text: Connect your Colony integrator to a computer in area of village to make use of it!
